resources.string:
We are a team of clever creatives,
 sharp marketers and
 savvy developers working together to
 create amazing content and make sure the world sees it.
A. H. M. Rezaul Karim \n Fardin Ahsan Sakib \n Ahmad Imam
How Do I make an order?
How to use the nutrition plan ?
What is the food reminder for?
How to use the medicine reminder?
How to use the food exchange ?
What to do if I forget my password?
What if I find a bug in the code?
It is taking forever to upload a prescription.What do I do ?
Log In. Go to Purchase from the menu. Upload the picture of the prescription.Enter names of the medicine with quantity.Fill out the information form and your order has been placed .

The app automatically suggests a nutrition plan based on your profile. Update your profile regularly with weight changes and the app will suggest a new diet according to your needs. Follow the diet, trust me, it works.
Taking your meals on time is important. We understand you are too busy to remember this. No problem, we will remind you.Just select a good time from the food reminder menu and we are on it.
You should always take your medicine on time. We will make sure that you do.Select a time , set alarm and we will take care of the rest.
If you get bored of your diet, we have a hack for you ;) You can always choose any other food in place of it from the food exchange , just dont forget about eating the right amount.
We got you covered. Enter your email. Click on forget password and we will send you a link for a passord reset.
Tell about it in the feedback. We will love to hear from you.
Its probably your internet connection. Wait a little longer ,please?
